messages.messageBody:
Hi ^_^ i know im new here, but im definately not a new fan to the
Shinsengumi, they've been with me for a while now! but i wanted to
share to you my shinsengumi forum, please stop by if you can, we have
great information developing , rpgs, and more!

http://sajun08.proboards2.com/index.cgi
